Ability.Name: Terminate

Description.OldValue: HK-51 launches a series of micro-missiles at his target, dealing high damage over the duration.

Ability.Description: HK-51 launches a series of micro-missiles at his target, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage over the duration.

Ability.Name: Rail Blast

Description.OldValue: Blasts a target for moderate damage.

Ability.Description: Blasts a target for <<1>> energy damage.

Ability.Name: Hunter Killer

Description.OldValue: Deals very high damage to a target below 30% health.

Ability.Description: Deals <<1>> weapon damage to a target below 30% health.

Ability.Name: Calibrated Shot

Description.OldValue: Shoots a target for moderate damage.

Ability.Description: Shoots a target for <<1>> weapon damage.

Ability.Name: Procedural Scan
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Quick Scan
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip

Description.OldValue: Slowly releases Kolto on the target healing for <<1>> for 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Preventative Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Collar Scan
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its Kolto Collar to heal a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Collar Dart
Ability.Description: Your creature fires a Kolto Dart from its collar, healing the target for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Affectionate Slobber

Description.OldValue: Your creature shows its affection by lavishing slobber on the target healing and cleansing it of mental and physical effects for <<1>> for 10 seconds. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Name: Collar Kolto Shield
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its collar to place a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple

Description.OldValue: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's collar that fires in a wide cone in front of the Akk Dog and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Cannot be used on targets in cover or on targets with Boss Immunity.

Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's collar that fires in a wide cone in front of the Akk Dog and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Power Charge

Description.OldValue: Your creature lunges at the target and delivers a powerful headbutt, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage, healing for the amount of damage dealt and generatess a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Description: Your creature lunges at the target and delivers a powerful headbutt, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Alpha Taunt
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack your creature for 6 seconds. Also reinforces your creature by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Fektur Sling
Ability.Description: Treek heals a target group member for <<1>> over the channel duration and an additional <<2>> at the end of the channel. Treek may not heal herself with this ability.

Ability.Name: Fektur Dart
Ability.Description: Treek injects a friendly group member with medicine that heals for <<1>> over 12 seconds and cleanses one negative mental or physical effect with each tick.

Ability.Name: Fektur Bug
Ability.Description: Treek sends a fektur bug at an enemy target. The fektur bug lands on the target and evaluates it for up to 8 seconds. If the target attacks a party member, the fektur bug flies to that party member and heals them for <<4>>.

Ability.Name: Fektur Sling
Ability.Description: Treek heals a target group member for <<1>> over the channel duration and an additional <<2>> at the end of the channel. Treek may not heal herself with this ability.

Ability.Name: Overhead Claw Slam

Description.OldValue: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> tech damage.

Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Taunting Regurgitation
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack the companion for 6 seconds. Also reinforces the companion by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Progressive Kolto Scan
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Quick Scan
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip

Description.OldValue: Slowly releases Kolto on the target healing and cleansing physical and mental effects for <<1>> for 9 seconds.

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Preventative Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Anti-Personnel Detonator

Description.OldValue: Activates an exploisve that deals <<1>> kinetic damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the user. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Description: Activates an explosive that deals <<1>> kinetic damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the user. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple

Description.OldValue: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Cannot be used on targets in cover or on targets with Boss Immunity.

Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Personal Threat
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack the companion for 6 seconds. Also reinforces the companion by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Progressive Kolto Scan
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Quick Scan
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip

Description.OldValue: Slowly releases Kolto on the target healing and cleansing physical and mental effects for <<1>> for 9 seconds.

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Preventative Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple

Description.OldValue: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Cannot be used on targets in cover or on targets with Boss Immunity.

Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike

Description.OldValue: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> tech damage, healing for the amount of damage dealt and generatess a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Personal Threat
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack the companion for 6 seconds. Also reinforces the companion by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Counterstrike quest on Makeb.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Deception Play quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the False History quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the For the Record quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Savage Skies quest on Makeb.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Sharing the Blame quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The Observer quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The Specialists quest on Makeb.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The Vipers Nest quest on Makeb.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Weapons Test quest on Makeb.

Ability.Name: Force Blast

Description.OldValue: Call on Valkorian's power to deliver a massive blast of Force energy.

Ability.Description: Call on Valkorion's power to deliver a massive blast of Force energy.

Ability.Name: Concentration
Ability.Description: Immune to damage and cannot be charged.

Ability.Name: Concentration
Ability.Description: Immune to damage and cannot be charged.

Ability.Name: Ranged Attack
Ability.Description: (Standard attack for Probe Droid)

Ability.Name: Advanced Anodyne Versatile Stim
Ability.Description: Increases Mastery by 198 and Power by 81 for 480 minutes. Only one stimpack can be active at a time. This effect persists through defeat.

Ability.Name: Prototype Field Tech Command Stim
Ability.Description: Increases Presence by 58 for 480 minutes. Only one stimpack can be active at a time. This effect persists through defeat.

Ability.Name: V-1 Seismic Grenade

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 20.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 20.

Ability.Name: V-2 Seismic Grenade

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 30.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 30.

Ability.Name: V-3 Seismic Grenade

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 40.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 40.

Ability.Name: V-4 Seismic Grenade

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 46.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 46.

Ability.Name: Wynz-Tek Experimental Shockwave Device

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 50.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 50.

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 20.

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 46.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 46.

Ability.Name: Wynz-Tek Experimental Shockwave Device

Description.OldValue: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconcious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 50.

Ability.Description: Disrupts the earth beneath all targets within 6 meters of the selected area, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage and knocking them unconscious for 4 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. (Cooldown: 180s). Damage dealt scales by level up to level 50.

Ability.Name: Juvenile Makrin Creeper
Ability.Description: Summons a Juvenile Makrin Creeper which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Legacy Force Lightning

Description.OldValue: Hurl an arc of lightningt, immobilizing the target and dealing energy damage over the duration. Can only be used during a Heroic Moment.

Ability.Description: Hurl an arc of lightning, immobilizing the target and dealing energy damage over the duration. Can only be used during a Heroic Moment.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Force Alliance Pack. This pack contains 2 items, including 1 Armor Lootbox, Mount or Vehicle, Rest and Recharge, Droid Companion or Stronghold Decoration, and 1 companion gift.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Force Alliance Pack. This pack contains 3 items, including 1 Armor Lootbox, Mount or Vehicle, Rest and Recharge, Droid Companion or Stronghold Decoration, 1 companion gift, and 1 Scrap Material.

Ability.Name: Give Treat To Companion
Ability.Description: Give a treat to your companion to show your affection for them.

Ability.Name: Give Treat To Companion
Ability.Description: Give a Treat to your herbivore companion to show your affection for them.

Ability.Name: Predacious Bronze Battle Flag of Recognition

Description.OldValue: Target a fallen enemy player in recoginition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your bronze performance in Season 6.

Ability.Description: Target a fallen enemy player in recognition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your bronze performance in Season 6.

Ability.Name: Predacious Gold Battle Flag of Recognition

Description.OldValue: Target a fallen enemy player in recoginition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your golden performance in Season 6.

Ability.Description: Target a fallen enemy player in recognition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your golden performance in Season 6.

Ability.Name: Predacious Silver Battle Flag of Recognition

Description.OldValue: Target a fallen enemy player in recoginition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your silver performance in Season 6.

Ability.Description: Target a fallen enemy player in recognition of their skills or of your victory. Awarded for your silver performance in Season 6.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the A Lesson Is Learned quest on Belsavis.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the A Rock and a Hard Place quest on Belsavis.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Breakthrough quest on Belsavis.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Armed and Dangerous quest on Korriban.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The Hate Machine quest on Korriban.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport

Description.OldValue: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Hunger of the Vrblthersy quest on Nar Shaddaa.

Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Hunger of the Vrblthers quest on Nar Shaddaa.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The Chamber of Speach quest on Tython.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Ancient Guardians quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Cleanse the Corrupted quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Rock Eaters quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the The First Commando's Call quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Cyber Mercenaries quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Not Afraid Enough quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Savage Connections quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Heroic Transport
Ability.Description: This pass allows you to travel to a safe area near the objective for the Trail of the First quest on Voss.

Ability.Name: Corrupted Voss
Ability.Description: This ability defines a creature as a "corrupted voss" targetable by the Dark Crystal Ability

Ability.Name: Dark Crystal
Ability.Description: Use this ability to draw the madness out of Corrupted Voss.

Ability.Name: Mission Review
Ability.Description: Social ability. Review your current mission while catching your breath.

Ability.Name: Shadowbox
Ability.Description: Social ability. Perform a series of mock blows, blocks, and counters, warming up for the fights to come.

Ability.Name: Hyperspace Beacon
Ability.Description: Drops a hyperspace beacon with a 180 second life span at your current location to serve as a respawn location for your team. The beacon will cease functioning if your ship is destroyed.

Ability.Name: Repair Drone
Ability.Description: Drops a repair drone at your current location. It repairs 120 points of hull damage every 3 seconds for up to three allies within 3000m. It will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed.

Ability.Name: Repair Drone
Ability.Description: Drops a repair drone at your current location. It repairs 120 points of hull damage every 3 seconds for up to three allies within 3000m. It will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed.

Ability.Name: Sensor Beacon
Ability.Description: Drops a sensor beacon at your current location. The beacon will detect enemies, transmitting their location to nearby team members. It will also reduce the evasion of all foes within 5000m by 10%. It will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed. One beacon may be active at a time.

Ability.Name: Interdiction Sentry Drone
Ability.Description: Drops a sentry drone armed with laser cannons at your current location. The sentry will project an interdiction field that will slow and reduce the turning rate of all foes within 3000m by 40%. The drone's laser cannon has a maximum range of 5000m, fires at 135 rounds per minute, and does 240 damage per shot. The drone will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed.

Ability.Name: Missile Sentry Drone
Ability.Description: Drops a sentry drone armed with laser cannons and a concussion missile launcher at your current location. The missile deals 340 damage with 20% shield piercing and has a range of 7000m. The drone's laser cannon has a maximum range of 5000m, fires at 135 rounds per minute, and does 240 damage per shot. The drone will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed.

Ability.Name: Railgun Sentry Drone
Ability.Description: Drops a sentry drone armed with a railgun at your current location. The sentry drone's railgun has a 10000m range, does 650 damage per hit with 20% shield piercing, takes 4 seconds to charge, and has a 2 second cooldown. The drone will last for 180 seconds, or until destroyed.

Ability.Name: Barrel Roll
Ability.Description: Rolls the ship 360-degrees while speeding forward, increasing evasion from direct-fire weapons by 24% and preventing missile locks for 3 seconds. Evades lock-on missiles when activated.

Ability.Name: Booster Recharge
Ability.Description: Regenerates 5% engine power per second for 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Rotational Thrusters
Ability.Description: Rapidly turns your ship to face your currently selected target within 15,000m.

Ability.Name: Interdiction Drive
Ability.Description: Triggers an immediate 50% increase to speed for 6 seconds, while reducing the speed and turning rate of enemies within 3000m by 20%.

Ability.Name: Koiogran Turn
Ability.Description: A 180-degree vertical turn, boosting evasion from direct-fire weapons by 24% and preventing missile locks for 3 seconds. Evades lock-on missiles when activated.

Ability.Name: Power Dive
Ability.Description: A 90-degree vertical turn, boosting evasion from direct-fire weapons by 24% and preventing missile locks for 3 seconds. Evades lock-on missiles when activated.

Ability.Name: Retro Thrusters
Ability.Description: Accelerates the ship in reverse for a short duration, boosting evasion from direct-fire weapons by 24% and preventing missile locks for 3 seconds. Evades lock-on missiles when activated.

Ability.Name: Snap Turn
Ability.Description: A quick 180 degree lateral turn, boosting evasion from direct-fire weapons by 24% and preventing missile locks for 3 seconds. Evades lock-on missiles when activated.

Ability.Name: Tensor Field
Ability.Description: Boosts the maximum speed and turning rate by 15% for your ship and all allied ships within 4500 meters for 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Shield Power Converter
Ability.Description: Transfers 20% of the engine's power to the shield power pool.

Ability.Name: Weapon Power Converter
Ability.Description: Transfers 20% of the engine's power to the weapon power pool.

Ability.Name: Concussion Mine
Ability.Description: Drops a proximity mine, with a 120 second lifespan, that will explode if an enemy gets within 1500m, dealing 905 damage with 20% shield piercing to all enemy ships within 2000m. Up to 2 Concussion Mines may be active at once.

Ability.Name: Interdiction Mine
Ability.Description: Drops a proximity mine, with a 120 second lifespan, that will explode if an enemy gets within 1500m, releasing a gravity pulse with a 2000m radius that slows hostile ships to 50% of their normal speed for 15 seconds, and deals 520 damage. Only 1 Interdiction Mine may be active at a time.

Ability.Name: Ion Mine
Ability.Description: Drops a proximity mine, with a 120 second lifespan, that will explode if an enemy gets within 1500m, dealing 900 shield damage or 112 hull damage to all enemy ships within 2000m, and draining 25 power from their weapon and engine power pools. Up to 2 Ion Mines may be active at once.

Ability.Name: Seeker Mine
Ability.Description: Drops a proximity mine, with a 120 second lifespan, that will launch itself at the first enemy that comes within 4000m, dealing 840 damage on impact. Up to 2 Seeker Mines may be active at once.

Ability.Name: Seismic Mine
Ability.Description: Drops a proximity mine, with a 120 second lifespan, that will explode if an enemy gets within 1500m, dealing 565 damage directly to the hulls of all enemy ships within 3000m. Only 1 Seismic Mine may be active at a time.

Ability.Name: Cluster Missiles
Ability.Description: Fires a swarm of short-range lock-on missiles that deal 650 damage to the target.

Ability.Name: Concussion Missile
Ability.Description: Fires a medium-range lock-on missile that does 1055 damage to the target, with 20% of the damage bypassing the target's shield.

Ability.Name: EMP Missile
Ability.Description: Fires a medium-range lock-on missile that releases an electromagnetic pulse with 3000m radius on impact with its target. The pulse will disable mines and drones for <<1>> seconds, and deal 335 damage directly to their hull, ignoring shields and damage reduction. Ships caught in the radius suffer half damage, and will have their system ability disabled for <<2>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Graviton Charges
Ability.Description: Graviton charges are launched towards nearby ships and generate an unstable gravity field after attaching to their target. This significantly reduces the speed and maneuverability of the target, and does some mild damage-over-time directly to the hull.

Ability.Name: Hull Charges
Ability.Description: Hull charges are launched towards nearby ships, where they stick to the ship hull and detonate after a short duration. They work like lock-on missiles, but have a very short maximum range and a fairly long cooldown time. They do good damage, and completely ignore their target's shield.

Ability.Name: Interdiction Missile
Ability.Description: Fires a short-range lock-on missile that does 690 damage, slows the target by 50%, and reduces the target's turning rate by 50% for 8 seconds.

Ability.Name: Ion Missile
Ability.Description: Fires a medium-range lock-on missile that deals 1580 shield damage or 197 hull damage to the target, and drains 15 power from both weapons and engines.

Ability.Name: Proton Torpedo
Ability.Description: Fires a long-range lock-on torpedo that deals 830 damage directly to the hull of the target, ignoring both shields and damage reduction.

Ability.Name: Plasma Warheads
Ability.Description: Rockets cause 15% additional damage over 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Sabotage Probe
Ability.Description: Launches a probe droid at the locked target, which will disable their maneuvering thrusters, reduce their evasion by 50%, and deal 280 damage to their hull over 0 seconds.

Ability.Name: Thermite Torpedo
Ability.Description: Fires a long-range lock-on torpedo that deals 575 damage on impact, and another 575 damage over 15 seconds. The missile is even more effective against hulls, doing 150% damage. It also reduces the target's damage reduction by 100% and causes 20% of all incoming damage to bleed through the target's shield for 15 seconds.

Ability.Name: Ion Railgun
Ability.Description: Fires an ion bolt that deals 1850 damage to shields or 462 damage to the target's hull, and drains 50 points of both weapon and engine power. Both the damage and power drain will be reduced if the railgun is not fully charged when it is fired, and the railgun will fail to fire if below 25% charge.

Ability.Name: Plasma Railgun
Ability.Description: Fires a plasma bolt that deals 900 damage on impact, and burns for an additional 900 damage over <<1>> seconds. The damage done will be reduced if the railgun is not fully charged when it is fired, and the railgun will fail to fire if below 25% charge.

Ability.Name: Slug Railgun
Ability.Description: Fires a metal slug that deals 1600 damage on impact, with 20% of the damage bypassing the target's shield. The damage done will be reduced if the railgun is not fully charged when it is fired, and the railgun will fail to fire if below 25% charge.

Ability.Name: Charged Plating
Ability.Description: Hull damage reduction increased by 60% for 15 seconds.

Ability.Name: Distortion Field
Ability.Description: Evasion increased by 27% for 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Feedback Shield
Ability.Description: Charges your shield with energy for 15 seconds that is released as damage against your next attacker. Triggers off Primary Weapon fire.

Ability.Name: Fortress Shield
Ability.Description: Increases shield strength by 130% for 30 seconds, but immobilizes the ship while active. The pilot can manually deactivate this ability, and triggering a defensive maneuver or boost will automatically deactivate the shield. A 30 second cooldown is triggered when the ability is deactivated.

Ability.Name: Overcharged Shield
Ability.Description: Increases shield capacity by 18% for 15 seconds, and instantly restores 20% of the base shield power.

Ability.Name: Quick-Charge Shield
Ability.Description: Recharges 30% of your ship's shields on activation.

Ability.Name: Shield Projector
Ability.Description: Restores 32% shield power over 6 seconds to your ship and up to 3 allies within a 3000m radius .

Ability.Name: Engine Power Converter
Ability.Description: Transfers 20% of the shield's power to the engine power pool.

Ability.Name: Repair Probes
Ability.Description: All friendly ships within 4500 meters will regain 75 hull strength every 4 seconds for 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Combat Command
Ability.Description: Increases primary weapon accuracy of all allied ships within 4500 meters by 10% for 20 seconds, and restores 5 points of their weapon power every 4 seconds.

Ability.Name: Blaster Overcharge
Ability.Description: Increases the rate of fire by 25% and weapon power regeneration by 15% for 9 seconds.

Ability.Name: EMP Field
Ability.Description: Causes an electromagnetic pulse around your ship that will damage and disable all hostile mines and drones in a 4500m radius for 15 seconds. Hostile ships caught in the pulse will have their accuracy reduced by 10%, their sensor and communication range reduced by 5000m, and their system ability disabled for 15 seconds.

Ability.Name: Remote Slicing
Ability.Description: Transmits slicing code that disables the target's system ability, and drains 40 points of shield power per second, for 9 seconds.

Ability.Name: Targeting Telemetry
Ability.Description: Increases weapon accuracy by 10%, critical chance by 5%, and sensor range by 5000m for 10 seconds. Also removes cloaking effects from all enemies within 3000m.

Ability.Name: Remote Control Ebon Hawk
Ability.Description: Impress your friends and intimidate your enemies by piloting your 4th anniversary remote control Ebon Hawk! You regenerate health and your class' energy pool while piloting.

Ability.Name: Turret Simulator
Ability.Description: You activate a nonlethal turret simulator. You regenerate health and your class' energy pool while firing.

Ability.Name: Gnarls Manka Cat
Ability.Description:
Summons the Gnarls Manka Cat creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Meirm Moth
Ability.Description:
Activates the Meirm Moth, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Equatorial Razoronn
Ability.Description:
Summons the Equatorial Razoronn creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Force Leap
Ability.Description: Jumps to a distant target, dealing <<1>> damage with the main-hand weapon, immoblizing the target for 2 seconds and interrupting the target's current action. Builds 3 focus. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
